name: Mercy
description:
My entry for the third Blackthornprod game jam!

My take on the theme is: Less monsters killed = more points

If you kill a monster you lose points, if you reach 0 points you lose the game.

Mercy is about a spike ball named Mr. Spikes. He has to get some oxygen tubes for his astronaut friend. However the astronaut has monster pets that very easily can be killed. Mr. Spikes has to be very careful so he doesn't accidently kill any monsters.

Sound effects and music are not made by me

Sound effects from: Bfxr and Freesound.org

Music from: OpenGameArt.org
